author: mrglavas
msg: Serialization compatibility of QName was broken in JAXP 1.3 when the serialVersionUID
changed from -9120448754896609940 (which was the original one introduced in JAX-RPC 1.0)
to 4418622981026545151. Restoring the original serialVersionUID and providing a system
be used to select 4418622981026545151 as the serialVersionUID. This is fixed thanks to

author: kmarsden
msg: DERBY-1041 - Modify derbynet/testProperties.java test to run with 10.1client/10.2 server
Attaching a patch 'derby-1041_10.1_v1.diff' for 10.1 branch. Patch does following:
* Modifies the test derbynet/testProperties.java to use a different stream for the shutdown process.
Ran derbynet/testProperties.java with 10.1 client and 10.2 server jars. Also ran the test with10.1 jars in DerbyNetClient and DerbyNet frameworks. Tests run with Sun JDK 1.4.2 on Win XP.
